text: Remo Capitani (19 December 1927 - 14 February 2014), also known as Ray O'Connor and Ray O'Conner, was an Italian actor from Rome. He was best known for his role in the western They Call Me Trinity as Mezcal, a Mexican thief. Capitani died on 14 February 2014 in his hometown of Rome. He was aged 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Rome Category:Italian movie actors
title: Remo Capitani
